snippet: The media haven’t recognized what has happened to the Republican Party, and that’s where Paul Ryan sees his opportunity to shine.
abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column argues that Rep Paul Ryan's fiscal acumen is a myth; asserts movement to draft him as next House Speaker is based solely on his perceived credibility to those outside his party; accuses media of refusing to admit this, which would force them to recognize Republicans are no longer serious abut policy.
lead_paragraph: The media haven’t recognized what has happened to the Republican Party, and that’s where Paul Ryan sees his opportunity to shine.

headline.print_headline: The Crazies and the Con Man
